import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import styles from "./Paywall.module.css"; import logo from "../assets/logo.svg"; import rocketIcon from "../assets/rocket.png"; import starIcon from "../assets/star.png"; import InstagramEmoji from "../components/InstagramEmoji"; export default function Paywall({ onPurchase }) { const [timer, setTimer] = useState(179); // 2:59 минуты const [selectedPlan, setSelectedPlan] = useState('yearly'); useEffect(() => { if (timer > 0) { const id = setTimeout(() => setTimer(timer - 1), 1000); return () => clearTimeout(id); } }, [timer]); const timerDisplay = `${String(Math.floor(timer / 60)).padStart(2, "0")}:${String(timer % 60).padStart(2, "0")}`; const handlePurchase = () => { if (window.trackEvent) { window.trackEvent('paywall_purchase_clicked', { plan: selectedPlan, price: selectedPlan === 'yearly' ? 19.99 : 4.99, timer_remaining: timer }); } onPurchase(); }; return (
